text: Olga Kurylenko (born 14 November 1979) is a Ukrainian-French actress and model. She started acting in 2005. She became famous by playing Bond girl Camille Montes in the movie Quantum of Solace. She also played Julia in the 2013 movie Oblivion. Kurylenko was born in Berdyansk, Ukrainian SSR, Soviet Union. On 15 March 2020, Kurylenko announced she had tested positive for COVID-19. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Actresses who played Bond girls Category:French models Category:French movie actors Category:Ukrainian models Category:Ukrainian movie actors
title: Olga Kurylenko
